tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_content BYTEA,
    upload_date TIMESTAMPTZ,
    expiration_date TIMESTAMPTZ,
    CONSTRAINT fk_employee FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(id)
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID,
    contract_type VARCHAR(50),
    contract_content BYTEA,
    start_date TIMESTAMPTZ,
    end_date TIMESTAMPTZ,
    CONSTRAINT fk_employee FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_documents (
    employee_id INT,
    document_id INT,
    document_name TEXT,
    document_type TEXT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, document_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_contracts (
    contract_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    contract_type TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    employee_id INT,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employee_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    contract_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    contract_terms VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_compliance (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    document_id INT,
    compliance_type VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employee_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_path VARCHAR(255),
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE employee_contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    contract_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    contract_file_path VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_versions (
    version_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    version_number INT,
    version_date DATE,
    download_link VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE document_categories (
    category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    department TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    document_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employee_documents (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    document_type_id INT,
    document_name TEXT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);
